title: 用指令弄武器的大神过来看看
author: 幻狱
txt_content:
怎么在这个指令上加上隐藏攻击+无法破坏+附魔效果的指令
summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~1 ~ ~ wall_sign 5 replace {Text1:"{text:\\\"Click\\\",clickEvent:{action:\\\"run_command\\\",value:\\\"blockdata ~-1 ~ ~ {Command:/give @p minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:90.0,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health}],ench:[{id:16,lvl:5},{id:20,lvl:2}],Unbreakable:1b,display:{Name:\\\u00a76曙光之剑,Lore:[\\\u00a7e传说中的神剑,\\\u00a7f据说拥有者可以获得金刚不坏之躯,\\\u00a7l\\\u00a74给人们带来希望,\\\u00a76曙光之剑,\\\u00a76曙光之剑,\\\u00a76曙光之剑]}},}\\\"}}"}}}

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
rooke_zb
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2016-12-24 21:51
summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~1 ~ ~ wall_ ...
他说的是隐藏那3个NBT吧，应该是HideFlags:63才对啊
